main event: A bright glowing object was sighted that glowed all the way to the ground. The next day, the observer's husband found a 3/4 inch metal object near the area of the sighting.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright glowing object that glowed all the way to the ground.
The metal object found the next day was composed of aluminum and iron, but was not considered related to the sighting.
The description of the object is consistent with that of a meteor observation.
The sighting lasted for about 4 seconds.
No photographs or physical evidence were obtained.
